long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Panchully VPN, your ultimate solution for secure and private browsing, now with Yahoo default search integration!
This extension provides unlimited access to VPN servers through search change to yahoo.

Key Features:

🌐 Secure and Private Browsing: Panchully VPN ensures your online activities are shielded from prying eyes. Protect your data and maintain your privacy while browsing the web.

🚀 High-Speed VPN: Enjoy lightning-fast connection speeds while securely accessing websites from anywhere in the world.

🔒 Anonymous Web Access: Panchully VPN masks your IP address, making it nearly impossible for anyone to trace your online footprint. Keep your identity and location hidden.

🔍 Yahoo Search Integration: Say goodbye to your old search engine! Panchully VPN seamlessly integrates Yahoo Search, delivering reliable and relevant search results right from your browser's address bar.

🛡️ Secure Data Transfer: Whether you're shopping, banking, or simply browsing, your data is encrypted, safeguarding it from potential threats.

🌍 Global Server Network: Connect to servers in multiple countries and access geo-restricted content with ease.

🆓 Completely Free: Enjoy all these features at no cost. No hidden fees or premium subscriptions.

Experience the power of Panchully VPN and the convenience of Yahoo Search. Take control of your online experience today!

Privacy Policy: https://panchully.com/privacy
